SEARCH
Package service

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
service.AuthService
public class AuthService extends Object
Handles authentication and registration logic for users, including validation and OTP verification.

      Returns:

    • verifyOTP

      public boolean verifyOTP(String otp)
      Verifies the entered OTP against the generated OTP.
      Parameters:
      otp - the OTP entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if the OTP matches, false otherwise
